events.message: The customer reported a car accident that occurred yesterday involving a collision with another vehicle at a busy intersection.
The claim has been categorized under Auto Accident following verification of keywords related to vehicle collision and damage.
An experienced claims agent was assigned to handle the customer's auto accident claim to ensure timely processing and assistance.
Acknowledgement of the claim was sent to the customer, confirming receipt of the auto accident report and initiation of the process.
The customer was asked to provide supporting documents including photos of the damaged vehicle and the police accident report.
The customer submitted all requested documents promptly, including detailed images of the vehicle damage and a copy of the police report.
The claims team began a thorough investigation into the circumstances of the vehicle collision and assessed the extent of the damage.
The investigation concluded with confirmation of liability and damage assessment aligned with the documents submitted by the customer.
A settlement offer reflecting repair costs and vehicle replacement value was proposed to the customer for approval.
The customer responded with gratitude, agreeing to the proposed settlement and expressing satisfaction with the claim handling process.
Following customer agreement, the claim was officially approved to proceed with payment and repairs for the damaged vehicle.
The insurance payment covering the cost of repairs and associated expenses was successfully issued to the customerâ€™s bank account.
The auto accident claim was closed following confirmation of vehicle repairs and payment settlement, with no outstanding issues reported.
All claim documents and records were archived securely for future reference, completing the administrative process of the insurance case.
